languages.text: Xenos threats beyond number surround the Imperium on every side. Most threatening by far are the xenos species whose territorial empires span star systems, and whose borders clash violently with those of the Imperium. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.
languages.original_text: Существует множество инопланетных видов, враждебных Империуму Человечества, и каждый из них — ересь в глазах Бога-Императора, которую необходимо искоренить. Вольные Торговцы и некоторые избранные имеют право мирно взаимодействовать с ксеносами в целях торговли, заключать с ними временные союзы или даже брать их в команду в качестве наемников.

traits.locale_text: There are countless alien species hostile to the Imperium of Man, all of them are blasphemy against the God-Emperor and must be eliminated. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.

There are countless alien species hostile to the Imperium of Man, all of them are blasphemy against the God-Emperor and must be eliminated. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.

Xenos threats beyond number surround the Imperium on every side. Most threatening by far are the xenos species whose territorial empires span star systems, and whose borders clash violently with those of the Imperium. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.

languages.text: Существует множество инопланетных видов, враждебных Империуму Человечества, и каждый из них — ересь в глазах Бога-Императора, которую необходимо искоренить. Вольные Торговцы и некоторые избранные имеют право мирно взаимодействовать с ксеносами в целях торговли, заключать с ними временные союзы или даже брать их в команду в качестве наемников.

Unzählige Xenos-Bedrohungen umgeben das Imperium von allen Seiten. Die bei weitem größte Bedrohung sind die Xenos-Spezies, deren territoriale Reiche sich über Sternensysteme erstrecken und deren Grenzen gewaltsam mit denen des Imperiums zusammenstoßen. Freihändler und einige wenige andere Individuen haben die Befugnis, friedliche Kontakte mit Xenos zu knüpfen, um mit ihnen Handel zu treiben, vorübergehende Bündnisse zu schließen oder sie als Söldner zu rekrutieren.
languages.original_text: Xenos threats beyond number surround the Imperium on every side. Most threatening by far are the xenos species whose territorial empires span star systems, and whose borders clash violently with those of the Imperium. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.

traits.locale_text: Unzählige Xenos-Bedrohungen umgeben das Imperium von allen Seiten. Die bei weitem größte Bedrohung sind die Xenos-Spezies, deren territoriale Reiche sich über Sternensysteme erstrecken und deren Grenzen gewaltsam mit denen des Imperiums zusammenstoßen. Freihändler und einige wenige andere Individuen haben die Befugnis, friedliche Kontakte mit Xenos zu knüpfen, um mit ihnen Handel zu treiben, vorübergehende Bündnisse zu schließen oder sie sogar als Söldner anzuheuern.

languages.text: D'innombrables xénos menacent l'Imperium. Les espèces xénos les plus menaçantes sont de loin celles dont les empires territoriaux s'étendent sur plusieurs systèmes stellaires et dont les frontières se heurtent violemment à celles de l'Imperium. Les libres-marchands et quelques autres individus sont habilités à établir des contacts pacifiques avec les xénos pour effectuer des transactions commerciales, conclure des alliances temporaires ou même les engager en tant que mercenaires.
languages.original_text: Xenos threats beyond number surround the Imperium on every side. Most threatening by far are the xenos species whose territorial empires span star systems, and whose borders clash violently with those of the Imperium. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.

traits.locale_text: D'innombrables xénos menacent l'Imperium. Les espèces xénos les plus menaçantes sont de loin celles dont les empires territoriaux s'étendent sur plusieurs systèmes stellaires et dont les frontières se heurtent violemment à celles de l'Imperium. Les Libres-Marchands et quelques autres individus sont habilités à établir des contacts pacifiques avec les xénos pour effectuer des transactions commerciales, conclure des alliances temporaires ou même pour les engager en tant que mercenaires.

languages.text: 异形的威胁来自四面八方。到目前为止，对帝国最具威胁的是疆域辽阔的异形物种，这些物种的疆域边界与帝国的边界发生了激烈的冲突。行商浪人与其他少数成员有权与异形进行和平接触，展开贸易，结成临时联盟，甚至可以雇佣异形当雇佣兵。
languages.original_text: Xenos threats beyond number surround the Imperium on every side. Most threatening by far are the xenos species whose territorial empires span star systems, and whose borders clash violently with those of the Imperium. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.

traits.locale_text: 异形的威胁来自四面八方。到目前为止，对帝国最具威胁的是疆域辽阔的异形物种，这些物种的疆域边界与帝国的边界发生了激烈的冲突。行商浪人与其他少数成员有权与异形进行和平接触，展开贸易，结成临时联盟，甚至可以雇佣异形当雇佣兵。

languages.text: 数知れぬ異種族（ゼノ）の脅威が帝国を四方八方から取り囲んでいる。これまでのところ最も脅威となるのは、星系にまたがる領土帝国を持ち、その国境が帝国の国境と激しく衝突する異種族だ。自由開拓者（ローグトレーダー）たちや他の少数の個人は、貿易、一時的な同盟、さらには傭兵として雇用するために異種族と平和的に接触する権限を持っている。
languages.original_text: Xenos threats beyond number surround the Imperium on every side. Most threatening by far are the xenos species whose territorial empires span star systems, and whose borders clash violently with those of the Imperium. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.

traits.locale_text: 数知れぬ異種族（ゼノ）の脅威が帝国を四方八方から取り囲んでいる。これまでのところ最も脅威となるのは、星系にまたがる領土帝国を持ち、その国境が帝国の国境と激しく衝突する異種族だ。自由開拓者（ローグトレーダー）たちや他の少数の個人は、貿易、一時的な同盟、さらには傭兵として雇用するために異種族と平和的に接触する権限を持っている。

languages.text: El Imperium se encuentra flanqueado por innumerables amenazas xenos. Las más peligrosas son aquellas especies xenos cuyos territorios abarcan sistemas estelares enteros y entran en conflicto con los del Imperium. Los Comerciantes Independientes y ciertos individuos más tienen autoridad para entablar contacto amistoso con los xenos, a fin de establecer vínculos comerciales, alianzas temporales o contratos como mercenarios.
languages.original_text: Xenos threats beyond number surround the Imperium on every side. Most threatening by far are the xenos species whose territorial empires span star systems, and whose borders clash violently with those of the Imperium. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.

traits.locale_text: El Imperium se encuentra flanqueado por innumerables amenazas xenos. Las más peligrosas son aquellas especies xenos cuyos territorios abarcan sistemas estelares enteros y entran en conflicto con los del Imperium. Los Comerciantes Independientes y ciertos individuos más tienen autoridad para entablar contacto amistoso con los xenos, a fin de establecer vínculos comerciales, alianzas temporales o contratos como mercenarios.

languages.text: Sayılamayacak kadar çok Zeno tehdidi, İmparatorluk'u dört bir yanından sarmıştır. Bunlar arasında açık ara en büyük tehlike, egemenlik alanları yıldız sistemlerine yayılmış ve sınırları İmparatorluk hudutlarıyla şiddetli biçimde çatışan zeno türleridir. Hür Tacirler de dâhil olmak üzere pek az kişinin zenolarla barışçıl temas kurmaya yetkisi bulunmaktadır. Bu şahıslar, zenolarla ticaret yapabilir, geçici ittifaklar kurabilir, hatta paralı asker olarak onları kiralayabilirler.
languages.original_text: Xenos threats beyond number surround the Imperium on every side. Most threatening by far are the xenos species whose territorial empires span star systems, and whose borders clash violently with those of the Imperium. Rogue Traders and a few other individuals have the authority to make peaceful contact with xenos for trade, temporary alliance, or even to hire them as mercenaries.
